product_name: BRU Green Label Coffee, 500g Poly Pack: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: High amount of Chicory, but that's not a bad thing.
reviews.review_body: Although this product is labelled as a coffee, it has only 53% of actual coffee (according to the packet). The remaining 47% is "chicory" powder. Now, if you are traditional coffee lover, you may be disappointed at first, as I was. I thought I was buying coffee. However, over time, I am becoming used to the mix of lower price with the added benefits of chicory ingestion.Chicory has high nutritional value. Dried root powder contains over 90% Inulin, a highly beneficial source of fiber (soluble and insoluble). In addition, the chicory leaves contain many sources of essential nutrients. It is also a source of energy and a natural sweetener. Chicory also imparts a somewhat bitter taste.The bottomline is that the addition of chicory actually enhances the nutritional value of the product. Of course, manufacturers save costs by cutting down on the amount of coffee they use. If you are fine with saving some costs and getting additional nutrition - highly processed coffee does not contain many nutrients - then this product is fine. Do not compare this to a 100% coffee product and you won't be disappointed. The price could be lower however.

reviews.review_title: Good if you have time to prepare it properly
reviews.review_body: Be careful. It's not instant coffee but it's filter coffee. You have to prepare it like tea and filer it like tea.Some people don't know this and write negative feedback.But it's really good and refreshing.

reviews.review_title: My regular weekday coffee gone bad!
reviews.review_body: ** Update **Something has gone wrong with this coffee’s  flavor in the last two packets. The batch of May 2019 is terrible. It has a weird taste and when I opened the other packets, I could not smell coffee but a weird off-putting smell. Very sad as this was my regular weekday coffee for years.This is our regular weekday coffee. It's not the best filter coffee you will ever have but it does the job. For weekends, we have Mysore concerns, Vasanth or Suma coffee.I love that it's available on Amazon saving me the trouble to source it here in Delhi, where filter coffee is not widely available.
Already I'd a bad feeling on seeing the price but anyway I tried and it sucks. But it's okay at the price tag probably lowest in the category.
Don't buy is you don't have filter coffee maker. It's better than another coffee powder of bru itself that I bought for 250₹.Its lot cheaper and tastier than the other one.

Coffee means Bru. Good airtight packing. Good taste. Value for money.  Not available for this price in retail. Those who subscribe for this item benefit more. Amazon amazes buyers always. Let good things last long.

reviews.review_title: Please do not buy this rubbish
reviews.review_body: This product is complete waste of money.. If want something good please go for instant coffee than this rubbish. I bought it due to minimal cost but that cost me even higher after seeing this dump..

This is my first time order for this item... Delivery,  packing was satisfied... I have been using this brand coffee more than 20 yrs.. Simply we love it... Good for filter coffee and normal coffee too... Recommended.

Found this wonderful coffee in 2013 when visiting Chennai!  Brought as much back with me as I could.  When I ran out I was heartbroken.  Then I found it on Amazon!  It is good.  The price and delivery are well within reason.
Beware it is half chicory and half cofee.
